se.project.storage.repos.interfaces

Interface WeeklyAvailabilityRepoInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeeklyAvailabilityProxyRepo, WeeklyAvailabilityRepo

    public interface WeeklyAvailabilityRepoInterface
    Is a DAO interface that provides method to manipulate Weekly Availability models.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<WeeklyAvailability> queryAllWeeklyAvailabilities(java.util.List<java.lang.String> competencies, int week)
      Queries the database for a list of availability for a certain list of required competencies.
      WeeklyAvailability queryMaintainerAvailability(Maintainer maintainer, int week)
      Queries the database for an instance with infos about the availability of a certain Maintainer.
      WeeklyAvailability queryMaintainerAvailability(java.lang.String username, int week)
      Queries the database for an instance with infos about the availability of a certain Maintainer.

    • Method Detail

      • queryMaintainerAvailability

        WeeklyAvailability queryMaintainerAvailability(java.lang.String username,
                                               int week)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for an instance with infos about the availability of a certain Maintainer.
        Parameters:
        username - is the username of the Maintainer you want to search.
        week - is the week to check the availability.
        Returns:
        an Availability object with all the informations about the Maintainer work.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • queryAllWeeklyAvailabilities

        java.util.List<WeeklyAvailability> queryAllWeeklyAvailabilities(java.util.List<java.lang.String> competencies,
                                                                int week)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the database for a list of availability for a certain list of required competencies.
        Parameters:
        competencies - are the required competencies.
        week - is the specific week of interest.
        Returns:
        a list of availability of Maintainers.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException
